On 10.6.1 on an early-2009 low-end 24" iMac the NoPE doesn't work. Extracted it, replaced the original one, and Quark doesn't start. Yes I am sure I did everything alright.

Ok, I figured out by myself that OS X recognized as a Document, because it has been edited (HFS+ knows that). Simple solution: copy the zip in the NoPE folder to a FAT/FAT32 partition. Then extract, and copy it into the app. I did that, and now it runs, but it's asking for an activation. Hmm.

All unzipped and installed BUT does not work even after following instructions and overwriting the appropriate file from the one that's included within the crack folder (within the NoPE folder). 

Shame! Just hope a working crack is released soon.
